description: Returns the current status of the configuration recorder you specify as well as the status of the last recording event for the configuration recorders. For a detailed status of recording events over time, add your Config events to Amazon CloudWatch metrics and use CloudWatch metrics. If a configuration recorder is not specified, this operation returns the status for the customer managed configuration recorder configured for the account, if applicable.

parameters.name: ConfigurationRecorderNames
parameters.description: The name of the configuration recorder. If the name is not specified, the opertation returns the status for the customer managed configuration recorder configured for the account, if applicable. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConfigurationRecordersStatus
nested_items.description: A list that contains status of the specified recorders.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration recorder.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration recorder.

nested_items.name: lastStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the recorder was last started.

nested_items.name: lastStopTime
nested_items.description: The time the recorder was last stopped.

nested_items.name: recording
nested_items.description: Specifies whether or not the recorder is currently recording.

nested_items.name: lastStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the latest recording event processed by the recorder.

nested_items.name: lastErrorCode
nested_items.description: The latest error code from when the recorder last failed.

nested_items.name: lastErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The latest error message from when the recorder last failed.

nested_items.name: lastStatusChangeTime
nested_items.description: The time of the latest change in status of an recording event processed by the recorder.

nested_items.name: servicePrincipal
nested_items.description: For service-linked configuration recorders, the service principal of the linked Amazon Web Services service.
